chunk: Ingredients: BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) LEAF AQUEOUS EXTRACT*, HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF AQUEOUS EXTRACT, ASPALATHUS LINEARIS (ROOIBOS*) AQUEOUS EXTRACT, AFRICAN WILD HONEY, ALOE BARBADENSIS (ALOE VERA) LEAF JUICE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CANANGA ODORATA (YLANG YLANG) OIL, VANILLA EXTRACT, POTASSIUM SORBATE, ASCORBIC ACID, D-LIMONENE.
book: 1398-Alaffia Antioxidant Facial Toner, Rooibos & Shea (2019 formulation)

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
